name: 彭朋群
objective: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.
schedule:
1-3. Introduction to fiber optic sensor
4-6. Fiber sensor devices
7-8. Fiber sensor systems
9-10. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques
11-12. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems
13-14. Long-distance fiber sensor systems
15-16. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems
17-18. Fiber sensor networks
materials:
Optical Fiber Sensors
Advanced Techniques and Applications
By Krzysztof Iniewski, Ginu Rajan, Krzysztof Iniewski
